author: Davina J
title: Super convenient bolthole in London -
text:
Really enjoyed my week at this recently renovated small hotel on the corner of Shaftesbury Ave and Dean Street Soho-Piccadilly. Formerly a dowdy Best Western, it has been upgraded by a family who have given it a warm atmosphere with very friendly and helpful staff and a small bar-restaurant serving a good breakfast buffet and Indian food and good wines in the evening. Their pricing is most reasonable considering the fantastic location and my corner room was a good size compared to many central London rooms.
Room Tip: Try to get a good size corner room noting Shaftesbury outlook is noisier than Dean. See more room tips
